00054 namespace {
00055 
00056   enum TypeMask {
00057     ROW_KEY =           (1 << 0),
00058     TIMESTAMP =         (1 << 1)
00059   };
00060 
00061   inline bool should_skip(int idx, const uint32_t *masks, bool dupkeycols) {
00062     uint32_t bm = masks[idx];
00063     return bm && ((bm & TIMESTAMP) || !(dupkeycols && (bm & ROW_KEY)));
00064   }
00065 
00066 } // local namespace

00071 LoadDataSource::LoadDataSource(const String &fname, const String &header_fname,
00072     const std::vector<String> &key_columns, const String &timestamp_column,
00073     int row_uniquify_chars, bool dupkeycols)
00074     : m_type_mask(0), m_source(fname), m_cur_line(0), m_line_buffer(0),
00075       m_row_key_buffer(0), m_hyperformat(false), m_leading_timestamps(false),
00076       m_timestamp_index(-1), m_timestamp(0), m_offset(0), m_zipped(false),
00077       m_rsgen(0), m_row_uniquify_chars(row_uniquify_chars),
00078       m_dupkeycols(dupkeycols) {
00079   String line, column_name;
00080   char *base, *ptr;
00081   int index = 0;
00082   KeyComponentInfo key_comps;
00083 
00084   if (row_uniquify_chars) {
00085     srandom((unsigned long)getpid());
00086     m_rsgen = new FixedRandomStringGenerator(row_uniquify_chars);
00087   }
00088 
00089   if (boost::algorithm::ends_with(fname, ".gz")) {
00090     m_fin.push(gzip_decompressor());
00091     m_zipped = true;
00092   }
00093   m_fin.push(m_source);
00094 
00095   if (header_fname != "") {
00096     std::ifstream in(header_fname.c_str());
00097     if (!getline(in, line))
00098       return;
00099   }
00100   else {
00101     if (!getline(m_fin, line))
00102       return;
00103   }
00104 
00105   // Assuming max column size of 256
00106   m_type_mask = new uint32_t [257];
00107   memset(m_type_mask, 0, 257*sizeof(uint32_t));
00108 
00109   base = (char *)line.c_str();
00110   if (*base == '#') {
00111     base++;
00112     while (isspace(*base))
00113       base++;
00114   }
00115   while ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) != 0) {
00116     *ptr++ = 0;
00117     m_column_names.push_back(base);
00118     column_name = String(base);
00119     if (timestamp_column != "" && timestamp_column == column_name) {
00120       m_timestamp_index = index;
00121       m_type_mask[index] |= TIMESTAMP;
00122     }
00123     base = ptr;
00124     index++;
00125     HT_EXPECT(index < 256, Error::TOO_MANY_COLUMNS);
00126   }
00127   m_column_names.push_back(base);
00128 
00132   for (size_t i=0; i<key_columns.size(); i++) {
00133     size_t j;
00134     const char *ptr;
00135 
00136     key_comps.clear();
00137 
00138     if (boost::algorithm::starts_with(key_columns[i], "\\%"))
00139       column_name = key_columns[i].substr(1);
00140     else if (boost::algorithm::starts_with(key_columns[i], "%0")) {
00141       key_comps.pad_character = '0';
00142       column_name = key_columns[i].substr(2);
00143       ptr = column_name.c_str();
00144       key_comps.width = atoi(ptr);
00145       while (isdigit(*ptr))
00146         ptr++;
00147       column_name = String(ptr);
00148     }
00149     else if (boost::algorithm::starts_with(key_columns[i], "%-")) {
00150       key_comps.left_justify = true;
00151       column_name = key_columns[i].substr(2);
00152       ptr = column_name.c_str();
00153       key_comps.width = atoi(ptr);
00154       while (isdigit(*ptr))
00155         ptr++;
00156       column_name = String(ptr);
00157     }
00158     else if (boost::algorithm::starts_with(key_columns[i], "%")) {
00159       column_name = key_columns[i].substr(1);
00160       ptr = column_name.c_str();
00161       key_comps.width = atoi(ptr);
00162       while (isdigit(*ptr))
00163         ptr++;
00164       column_name = String(ptr);
00165     }
00166     else
00167       column_name = key_columns[i];
00168 
00169     for (j=0; j<m_column_names.size(); j++) {
00170       if (m_column_names[j] == column_name) {
00171         key_comps.index = j;
00172         m_key_comps.push_back(key_comps);
00173         m_type_mask[j] |= ROW_KEY;
00174         break;
00175       }
00176     }
00177     if (j == m_column_names.size()) {
00178       cout << "ERROR: key column '" << column_name
00179            << "' not found in input file" << endl;
00180       exit(1);
00181     }
00182   }
00183 
00184   if (m_key_comps.empty()) {
00185     key_comps.clear();
00186     m_key_comps.push_back(key_comps);
00187     m_type_mask[0] |= ROW_KEY;
00188   }
00189 
00190   if (m_column_names.size() == 3 || m_column_names.size() == 4) {
00191     size_t i=m_column_names.size()-3;
00192     if (m_column_names[i] == "rowkey" &&
00193         m_column_names[i+1] == "columnkey" &&
00194         m_column_names[i+2] == "value") {
00195       if (i == 0 || m_column_names[0] == "timestamp") {
00196         m_hyperformat = true;
00197         m_leading_timestamps = (i==1);
00198       }
00199     }
00200   }
00201 
00202   m_next_value = m_column_names.size();
00203   m_limit = 0;
00204 
00205   if (!m_hyperformat && m_column_names.size() < 2)
00206     HT_THROW(Error::HQL_BAD_LOAD_FILE_FORMAT,
00207              "No columns specified in load file");
00208 
00209   m_cur_line = 1;
00210 
00211   return;
00212 }

00218 bool
00219 LoadDataSource::next(uint32_t *type_flagp, uint64_t *timestampp, KeySpec *keyp,
00220     uint8_t **valuep, uint32_t *value_lenp, uint32_t *consumedp) {
00221   String line;
00222   int index;
00223   char *base, *ptr, *colon, *endptr;
00224 
00225   if (type_flagp)
00226     *type_flagp = FLAG_INSERT;
00227 
00228   if (consumedp)
00229     *consumedp = 0;
00230 
00231   if (m_hyperformat) {
00232 
00233     while (getline(m_fin, line)) {
00234       m_cur_line++;
00235 
00236       if (consumedp && !m_zipped)
00237         *consumedp += line.length() + 1;
00238 
00239       m_line_buffer.clear();
00240 
00241       m_line_buffer.add(line.c_str(), strlen(line.c_str())+1);
00242 
00243       base = (char *)m_line_buffer.base;
00244 
00248       if (m_leading_timestamps) {
00249         if ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) == 0) {
00250           cerr << "error: too few fields on line " << m_cur_line << endl;
00251           continue;
00252         }
00253         *ptr++ = 0;
00254         *timestampp = strtoll(base, &endptr, 10);
00255         if (*endptr != 0) {
00256           cerr << "error: invalid timestamp (" << base << ") on line "
00257                << m_cur_line << endl;
00258           continue;
00259         }
00260         base = ptr;
00261       }
00262       else
00263         *timestampp = 0;
00264 
00268       if ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) == 0) {
00269         cerr << "error: too few fields on line " << m_cur_line << endl;
00270         continue;
00271       }
00272       if (m_rsgen) {
00273         keyp->row_len = (ptr-base) + m_row_uniquify_chars + 1;
00274         m_row_key_buffer.clear();
00275         m_row_key_buffer.ensure(keyp->row_len + 1);
00276         m_row_key_buffer.add_unchecked(base, ptr-base);
00277         m_row_key_buffer.add_unchecked(" ", 1);
00278         m_rsgen->write((char *)m_row_key_buffer.ptr);
00279         keyp->row = m_row_key_buffer.base;
00280       }
00281       else {
00282         keyp->row = base;
00283         keyp->row_len = ptr - base;
00284       }
00285       *ptr++ = 0;
00286       base = ptr;
00287 
00291       if ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) == 0) {
00292         cerr << "error: too few fields on line " << m_cur_line << endl;
00293         continue;
00294       }
00295       *ptr = 0;
00296 
00297       if ((colon = strchr(base, ':')) != 0) {
00298         *colon++ = 0;
00299         keyp->column_family = base;
00300         if (colon < ptr) {
00301           keyp->column_qualifier = colon;
00302           keyp->column_qualifier_len = ptr - colon;
00303         }
00304         else {
00305           keyp->column_qualifier = 0;
00306           keyp->column_qualifier_len = 0;
00307         }
00308       }
00309       else {
00310         keyp->column_qualifier = 0;
00311         keyp->column_qualifier_len = 0;
00312       }
00313       keyp->column_family = base;
00314       ptr++;
00315 
00319       *valuep = (uint8_t *)ptr;
00320       *value_lenp = strlen(ptr);
00321 
00322       if (m_zipped && consumedp) {
00323         uint64_t new_offset = m_source.seek(0, BOOST_IOS::cur);
00324         *consumedp = new_offset - m_offset;
00325         m_offset = new_offset;
00326       }
00327 
00328       return true;
00329     }
00330   }
00331   else {
00332     // skip timestamp and rowkey (if needed)
00333     while (m_next_value < m_limit &&
00334            should_skip(m_next_value, m_type_mask, m_dupkeycols))
00335       m_next_value++;
00336 
00337     // get from parsed cells if available
00338     if (m_next_value > 0 && m_next_value < m_limit) {
00339       keyp->row = m_row_key_buffer.base;
00340       keyp->row_len = m_row_key_buffer.fill();
00341       keyp->column_family = m_column_names[m_next_value].c_str();
00342       *timestampp = m_timestamp;
00343       // clear these, just in case they were set by the client
00344       if (keyp->column_qualifier || keyp->column_qualifier_len) {
00345         keyp->column_qualifier = 0;
00346         keyp->column_qualifier_len = 0;
00347       }
00348       if (m_values[m_next_value] == 0) {
00349         *valuep = 0;
00350         *value_lenp = 0;
00351       }
00352       else {
00353         *valuep = (uint8_t *)m_values[m_next_value];
00354         *value_lenp = strlen(m_values[m_next_value]);
00355       }
00356       m_next_value++;
00357 
00358       if (m_zipped && consumedp) {
00359         uint64_t new_offset = m_source.seek(0, BOOST_IOS::cur);
00360         *consumedp = new_offset - m_offset;
00361         m_offset = new_offset;
00362       }
00363 
00364       return true;
00365     }
00366 
00367     while (getline(m_fin, line)) {
00368       m_cur_line++;
00369       index = 0;
00370 
00371       if (consumedp && !m_zipped)
00372         *consumedp += line.length() + 1;
00373 
00374       boost::trim(line);
00375       if (line.length() == 0)
00376         continue;
00377 
00378       m_line_buffer.clear();
00379       m_line_buffer.add(line.c_str(), strlen(line.c_str())+1);
00380       m_values.clear();
00381 
00382       base = (char *)m_line_buffer.base;
00383 
00384       while ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) != 0) {
00385         *ptr++ = 0;
00386 
00387         if (strlen(base) == 0 || !strcmp(base, "NULL") ||
00388             !strcmp(base, "\\N")) {
00389           if (m_type_mask[index]) {
00390             cout << "WARNING: Required key or timestamp field not found "
00391                 "on line " << m_cur_line << ", skipping ..." << endl << flush;
00392             continue;
00393           }
00394           m_values.push_back(0);
00395         }
00396         else
00397           m_values.push_back(base);
00398 
00399         base = ptr;
00400         index++;
00401       }
00402       if (strlen(base) == 0 || !strcmp(base, "NULL") || !strcmp(base, "\\N"))
00403         m_values.push_back(0);
00404       else
00405         m_values.push_back(base);
00406 
00407       m_limit = std::min(m_values.size(), m_column_names.size());
00408 
00412       m_row_key_buffer.clear();
00413       if (!add_row_component(0))
00414         continue;
00415 
00416       size_t i;
00417       for (i=1; i<m_key_comps.size(); i++) {
00418         m_row_key_buffer.add(" ", 1);
00419         if (!add_row_component(i))
00420           break;
00421       }
00422       if (i<m_key_comps.size())
00423         continue;       // rowkey not found. warning in add_row_component.
00424 
00425       m_row_key_buffer.ensure(1);
00426       *m_row_key_buffer.ptr = 0;
00427 
00428       if (m_timestamp_index >= 0) {
00429         struct tm tm;
00430         time_t t;
00431 
00432         if (m_values.size() <= (size_t)m_timestamp_index) {
00433           cerr << "warn: timestamp field not found on line " << m_cur_line
00434                << ", skipping..." << endl;
00435           continue;
00436         }
00437 
00438         if (!parse_date_format(m_values[m_timestamp_index], &tm)) {
00439           cerr << "warn: invalid timestamp format on line " << m_cur_line
00440                << ", skipping..." << endl;
00441           continue;
00442         }
00443 
00444         if ((t = timegm(&tm)) == (time_t)-1) {
00445           cerr << "warn: invalid timestamp format on line " << m_cur_line
00446                << ", skipping..." << endl;
00447           continue;
00448         }
00449 
00450         m_timestamp = (uint64_t)t * 1000000000LL;
00451       }
00452 
00453       m_next_value = 0;
00454       while (should_skip(m_next_value, m_type_mask, m_dupkeycols))
00455         m_next_value++;
00456 
00457       if (m_rsgen) {
00458         m_row_key_buffer.ensure(m_row_uniquify_chars + 2);
00459         keyp->row = m_row_key_buffer.base;
00460         keyp->row_len = m_row_key_buffer.fill() + m_row_uniquify_chars + 1;
00461         m_row_key_buffer.add_unchecked(" ", 1);
00462         m_rsgen->write((char *)m_row_key_buffer.ptr);
00463         m_row_key_buffer.ptr += m_row_uniquify_chars;
00464       }
00465       else {
00466         keyp->row = m_row_key_buffer.base;
00467         keyp->row_len = m_row_key_buffer.fill();
00468       }
00469 
00470       keyp->column_family = m_column_names[m_next_value].c_str();
00471       *timestampp = m_timestamp;
00472       if (keyp->column_qualifier || keyp->column_qualifier_len) {
00473         keyp->column_qualifier = 0;
00474         keyp->column_qualifier_len = 0;
00475       }
00476       if (m_values[m_next_value] == 0) {
00477         *valuep = 0;
00478         *value_lenp = 0;
00479       }
00480       else {
00481         *valuep = (uint8_t *)m_values[m_next_value];
00482         *value_lenp = strlen(m_values[m_next_value]);
00483       }
00484       m_next_value++;
00485 
00486       if (m_zipped && consumedp) {
00487         uint64_t new_offset = m_source.seek(0, BOOST_IOS::cur);
00488         *consumedp = new_offset - m_offset;
00489         m_offset = new_offset;
00490       }
00491 
00492       return true;
00493     }
00494 
00495   }
00496 
00497   return false;
00498 }

00502 bool LoadDataSource::add_row_component(int index) {
00503   const char *value = m_values[m_key_comps[index].index];
00504   size_t value_len = strlen(value);
00505 
00506   if ((size_t)m_key_comps[index].index >= m_values.size() || value == 0) {
00507     cout << "WARNING: Required key field not found on line " << m_cur_line
00508          << ", skipping ..." << endl << flush;
00509     return false;
00510   }
00511 
00512   if ((size_t)m_key_comps[index].width > value_len) {
00513     size_t padding = m_key_comps[index].width - value_len;
00514     m_row_key_buffer.ensure(m_key_comps[index].width);
00515     if (m_key_comps[index].left_justify) {
00516       m_row_key_buffer.add(value, value_len);
00517       memset(m_row_key_buffer.ptr, m_key_comps[index].pad_character, padding);
00518       m_row_key_buffer.ptr += padding;
00519     }
00520     else {
00521       memset(m_row_key_buffer.ptr, m_key_comps[index].pad_character, padding);
00522       m_row_key_buffer.ptr += padding;
00523       m_row_key_buffer.add(value, value_len);
00524     }
00525   }
00526   else
00527     m_row_key_buffer.add(value, value_len);
00528 
00529   return true;
00530 
00531 }

00534 
00535 bool LoadDataSource::parse_date_format(const char *str, struct tm *tm) {
00536   int ival;
00537   const char *ptr = str;
00538   char *end_ptr;
00539 
00543   if ((ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10)) == 0 || (end_ptr - ptr) != 4 ||
00544       *end_ptr != '-')
00545     return false;
00546 
00547   tm->tm_year = ival - 1900;
00548   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00549 
00553   if ((ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10)) == 0 || (end_ptr - ptr) != 2 ||
00554       *end_ptr != '-')
00555     return false;
00556 
00557   tm->tm_mon = ival - 1;
00558   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00559 
00563   if ((ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10)) == 0 || (end_ptr - ptr) != 2 ||
00564       *end_ptr != ' ')
00565     return false;
00566 
00567   tm->tm_mday = ival;
00568   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00569 
00573   ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10);
00574   if ((end_ptr - ptr) != 2 || *end_ptr != ':')
00575     return false;
00576   tm->tm_hour = ival;
00577 
00578   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00579 
00583   ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10);
00584   if ((end_ptr - ptr) != 2 || *end_ptr != ':')
00585     return false;
00586   tm->tm_min = ival;
00587 
00588   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00589 
00593   ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10);
00594   if ((end_ptr - ptr) != 2)
00595     return false;
00596   tm->tm_sec = ival;
00597 
00598   tm->tm_gmtoff = 0;
00599   tm->tm_zone = "GMT";
00600 
00601   return true;
00602 }
